name: Google Outdoors App
description:
About


This is a project a made a couple months ago the pitch is as follows: after the coronavirus pandemic is over when people are going to “need motivation” to go out a rediscover the world all that whit a google like application (same ux / ui ). So the idea of the app is that you can create or choose a custom routs created my other users that can help you visit the city around you can filter the routs buy length, amount of stuff to visit and more, all that with a bit of gamification.


In this file you will find:

Main app: where the main design piece is located

App Route: that shoes how the app work

Design system: where fonts, colors are located

Logo where the logo is located

Mockups of the app

Dark mode for some dark mode examples of the app


Credit

Credit where credit is due the design system is

inspired by :

Product Style Guide Template ( community ) and some of the

components are from old figma file I have downloaded a while back but can’t

put my hand on.

Feel free to follow me on figma Community for more Design and to follow me on social media (links on my figma profile)


Have a nice day
